channel.title: Help Please, How do I change
channel.description:
Hello, Please help I need to change [b]Agility[/b] Xp Rates and [b]Prayer[/b] Xp Rates. This is for Project Catastrophe Source.
Thanks ;) oomk

item.title: Help Please, How do I change
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

Prayer:

if(ItemID == 536){ deleteItem(536, 1); addSkillXP(160*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); startAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); }

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please, How do I change
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

oomk:

Thanks, what do I add this to?

in your client.java if you allready have the (bones on altar) process in there just post it below that if you dont have that working heres that one also in client.java search case: 192 than post it below that
all of the bones

if(UsedOnObjectID == 10638){ //Altar
if(ItemID == 526){ //Bones
deleteItem(526, 1);
addSkillXP(40getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); //Exp Amount
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
startAnimation(894);
lowGFX(247,0);
}
if(ItemID == 532){ //Big Bones
deleteItem(532, 1);
addSkillXP(80getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); //Exp Amount
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
startAnimation(894);
lowGFX(247,0);
}
if(ItemID == 536){ //Dragon Bones
deleteItem(536, 1);
addSkillXP(160getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); //Exp Amount
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
startAnimation(894);
lowGFX(247,0);
}
if(ItemID == 6729){ //Dagannoth Bones
deleteItem(6729, 1);
addSkillXP(320getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); //Exp Amount
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
startAnimation(894);
lowGFX(247,0);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please, How do I change
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Hi think i may help.
for the prayer xp rates if im right youd want to be changing the amount of exp for the different type of bones?
that would be in the client search == (the bones id#) should see some thing like this

if(ItemID == 536){ //Dragon Bones
deleteItem(536, 1);
addSkillXP(160*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5);
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
startAnimation(894);
lowGFX(247,0);
}

and you can cange it if some bones dont work just copy and paste the origional one and change the numbers around i got all bones plus dagannoth’s

ok and for the agility think that would be done the same way kinda but the object id like the “tunnel” the required level and the exp outcome and the systemtimer (how often the action can be done) dont got a snippet of that though hope this helps some,

Read full topic
